channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MI

item.title: Report E-2024050233
item.description:
Report E-2024050233

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-13T15:12:55+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-30
  • City: WESTLAND
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: VEOLIA ES TECHNICAL SOLUTIONS, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: While transferring the containers from a Veolia trailer to the 3rd party trailer at Veolia's ten day intransit facility a Veolia employee noticed two drums containing a flammable corrosive material to be leaking. The drums appeared to have been pinched by a forklift when they were loaded at the shipper's site. The dent created weak spots in the drums causing the leak. The liquid was contained in the trailer and was between 1/2 to 1 gallon. The drums were overpacked for continued transportation.

item.title: Report X-2024050416
item.description:
Report X-2024050416

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-13T15:12:55+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-26
  • City: ROMULUS
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO AN AIR PACKAGE THAT WAS SLIGHTLY WET AND NEEDED TO BE REWRAPPED. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY FIVE POUNDS OF DRY ICE COOLING FOOD. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX TO INDICATE DRY ICE WAS BEING SHIPPED AIR SERVICE. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. THE SHIPPER CONTACT NAME ON THE THERMAL TRACKING LABEL IS MICHAEL ANTHONY.

item.title: Report X-2024050292
item.description:
Report X-2024050292

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-09T15:13:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-29
  • City: MADISON HEIGHTS
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A HEAVY TOOLBOX FOR INVESTIGATION OF THE CONTENTS DUE TO THE LOADER SEEING SOME TYPE OF FLAMMABLE ITEM THROUGH THE TOP OF THE TOOLBOX. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED SEVEN LITHIUM ION BATTERIES PACKED WITH TWO MILWAUKEE DRILLS AMONG VARIOUS OTHER FLAMMABLE ITEMS. THERE IS (1) 4 OUNCE CONTAINER OF LIQUID TAPE (UN1133, ADHESIVES), (3) PAINT-RITER LIQUID PAINT MARKERS (UN1263, PAINT), (2) 1 OUNCE TUBES OF CROSS CHECK TORQUE SEAL (UN1263, PAINT), (1) 5.6 OUNCE CAN OF MAG TORCH BUTANE (UN2037, RECEPTACLES SMALL CONTAINING GAS) AND (1) LIGHTER (UN1057, LIGHTERS). THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER TOOLBOX. THE PACKAGE WAS SCANNED INTO AN AIR CONTAINER BUT WAS DISCOVERED AND INSPECTED PRIOR TO ACTUALLY BEING LOADED ON A FLIGHT.

item.title: Report X-2024050176
item.description:
Report X-2024050176

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-07T15:13:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-24
  • City: LIVONIA
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER CALLED TO HAZMAT AUDITOR HOLDING AREA FOR A POSSIBLE UNDECLARED PACKAGE DISCOVERED BY CUSTOMER COUNTER CLERK. PACKAGE WAS SUPPOSED TO CONTAIN AUTO PARTS AS DECLARED BY THE SHIPPER. UPON INSPECTION THE PACKAGE HAD 3 PAINT CANS. PACKAGE IN BEING HELD FOR REGULATORY INSPECTION.
